name: The Ripple Tribe
description: My Naked Bar is a local vegan artisanal bar soap label founded by an eco mummy to save a better planet for our children. Our face and body soap bars are handcrafted from scratch using natural ingredients with the glycerin produced intact within every bar. The bars are suitable for all ages and skin types, especially benefiting users with sensitive skin conditions such as eczema and psoriasis. Bars are delivered in milk cartons contributed by the community and upcycled by the brand to advocate low waste living. #soapsinmilkcartons See more at www.mynakedbar.com. My Naked Bar is a local vegan artisanal bar soap label founded by an eco mummy to save a better planet for our children. Our face and body soap bars are handcrafted from scratch using natural ingredients with the glycerin produced intact within every bar. The bars are suitable for all ages and skin types, especially benefiting users with sensitive skin conditions such as eczema and psoriasis. Bars are delivered in milk cartons contributed by the community and upcycled by the brand to advocate low waste living. #soapsinmilkcartons
